data.actual_result: They get smaller and are slightly misplaced, not scaling with any icon on the client
data.expected_result: The colorblind symbols should stay consistent
data.short_description: Colorblind symbols don't scale with icons at lower zoom levels
data.steps_to_repro: - Enable Colorblind in Appearance - Put your zoom level to default(100) in Apperance - Observe colorblind symbols - Go back to Appearance and change your zoom level to 80
